body:
@Pranay144 it's easier for me to review your code if you simply submit a PR. Don't worry if it's not perfect right from the start, you can make updates to the PR!
From a quick glance, it seems more or less correct (but we don't want to add the max_attempt parameter to clone_git_repo, and "stop" must be an argument of tenacity.retry not subprocess.run).
can i work on this issue? @marco-c

Anyone can work on any issue, read the guidance for first contributors, unless there is already a PR open to fix an issue.
@Pranay144 hasn't opened a PR yet, but it's almost as if he did, so he would have priority.

issue.title: replaced custom retry function with tenacity retrying library.

issue.body:
Remove retry function and related RunException from utils.py for bot and replaces it with Tenacity retry in taskcluster.py and uploader.py
Fixes #110

issue.title: Use exponential backoff when retrying with tenacity

repository.name: bugbug

issue.body: After switching to tenacity (#1234), we should start using exponential backoff instead of normal retries.

body: @marco-c  i would like to work on this issue. Seems this issue was already fixed but is being reverted, what seems to be the issue here?
@NitishNaineni usage of tenacity was not implemented correctly.
@marco-c Would how it is implemented in https://github.com/mozilla/code-coverage/pull/366 work?
